author: eat food
subject: another enigma
body:
I was under the impression that Miyazaki only worked on some first series
eps (with Takahata), and the last two eps of the second series (which I have
a cel from one of, tee hee). And of course Cagliostro. All I have seen
except the first series eps, but then I came across this cel on a website.
http://www.fan-animecells.com/080/080001.jpg
Lupin is sporting a red blazer, indicating second series, and the art style
is definitely Miyazaki. (look at Lupin's expression! and his ears) This
scene is definitely not in eps 144 or 145, so what gives?

Oh well, I have dibs on this cel anyway. Lupin cels are hard to find...


-valerie 
http://members.tripod.com/~valerie
----------
Like rescuing precious stones that are confined in a safe...
It would be unjust to leave a girl here to be made a bride...
I will tell you the tale of the green fields.
This is the work of every thief.
-Lupin, Cagliostro no Shiro
